alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 9:51PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT ONEIDA COUNTY THROUGH 1015 PM EDT... At 950 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Central Square to 6 miles northeast of Utica. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Utica, Rome, Lee, Verona, Westmoreland, Vienna, Trenton, Deerfield, Floyd, and Whitesboro. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 31 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
